name: Combustion County
description:
Combustion County has a problem with – you guessed it – spontaneous combustion. 

You and two friends have volunteered to operate a firetruck to keep the flames in check. 

Each one of you will operate one of three stations onboard to drive the vehicle and extinguish buildings.

Positions occasionally swap, so stay alert!

(You can play with less players by having one player control multiple truck positions at once!)

Player 1: A S D

Player 2: J K L

Player 3: Left, Down, Right (arrow keys)


Made in 2 weeks for the Philly Game Mechanics "Fire" Jam

~Copyright Colin Page 2022~
